title: A Familiar Face
tags: how to unlock a familiar face
content:
A Familiar Face Type Companion Quest Act Act 3: Lower City Companion Shadowheart Reward TBA

A Familiar Face is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. A Familiar Face is a part of the Daughter of Darkness Questline. A Familiar Face can be acquired from Shadowheart. Completing A Familiar Face will progress Shadowheart story progression forward. The interactions for this quest could be affected by your choices in The Daughter of Darkness.

A Familiar Face Objectives

Find Shadowheart's old friend.
